title: Handle a Lowball Offer
description: A listing agent receives a purchase offer significantly below the asking price and must advise the seller on how to respond.

tasks.description: Present the low offer to the seller and provide context based on current market conditions and recent comps.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent helps the seller understand the offer in the context of the market.

tasks.description: Advise the seller on response options: ignore, reject, or make a counter-offer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear, strategic advice on how to proceed.

tasks.description: The seller decides to counter. Draft a counter-offer with a price closer to the asking price and send it to the buyer's agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal counter-offer is generated and submitted.
